sentences.en: Changing your perspective can often uncover previously undetected issues in layout and composition.
sentences.cn: 再改变角度看看,这样就可以发现一些布局上和构成上的问题.

sentences.en: Customs officials uncovered a plot to smuggle weapons into the country.
sentences.cn: 海关官员侦破了一个走私武器入境的阴谋。

sentences.en: Follow that pathway and uncover the sweet sunrises that await you.
sentences.cn: 沿路前进,美好的日出正等着你,快去揭开她的面纱吧.

sentences.en: Fortunately, the study didn't uncover huge, unimagined dangers to patients.
sentences.cn: 所幸的是, 研究并未发现这种药对病人会有大到不可想象的危险.

sentences.en: He wondered if the police investigation would uncover the offending car and driver.
sentences.cn: 他不知道警察能不能查获这辆犯法的汽车及驾车人.

sentences.en: His goal throughout the Hiss case was to obstruct our efforts to uncover the facts.
sentences.cn: 在整个希斯案件中,他的目的是阻碍我们揭露真相.

sentences.en: In her novel on Taylor, she tries to uncover the inner man.
sentences.cn: 在那本关于泰勒的小说中, 她试图揭示出他的内心世界.

sentences.en: In spring we uncover the swimming pool.
sentences.cn: 春天我们移去游泳池的覆盖物.

sentences.en: Persistent research will uncover a logical justification.
sentences.cn: 持续的研究将会揭示出逻辑上的正确性.

sentences.en: Results This model can uncover the non - linear relationship between disease and age.
sentences.cn: 结果该模型可以揭示出发病与年龄的复杂非线性关系.

sentences.en: To improve its validity we must uncover more information.
sentences.cn: 要提高财务报告内容的有效性,必须增加披露会计信息.

sentences.en: Uncover the pan and let the soup simmer.
sentences.cn: 揭开锅盖，让汤再慢火煨一下。

sentences.en: Using slowdowns to uncover and hire displaced talent is often fruitful.
sentences.cn: 通过放缓招聘过程来逮住一些杰出人才常常会有意想不到的效果.

sentences.en: We should do our best to uncover our national human resources.
sentences.cn: 我们应该尽量发掘自己民族的人文资源.

sentences.en: When the seedlings sprout, uncover the tray.
sentences.cn: 秧苗发芽后，就把盘子上的盖子拿掉。

words.tran_cn: 无覆盖物的；[保险] 未保险的；无盖的
揭露（uncover的过去分词）；脱帽致敬；移去覆盖物

trans.tran_en: to remove the cover from something

trans.tran_cn: 揭露， 暴露； 揭开…的盖子
trans.tran_en: to find out about something that has been kept secret
